Instruction: Place the pork chops in a baking pan.
Combine basil, onion powder, and seasoned salt in a mixing bowl.

Pour half of the balsamic vinegar over the pork chops and ensure even coating; sprinkle half of the basil mixture over the chops. Flip the pork chops and coat them with the remaining balsamic vinegar and basil mixture. Top each pork chop with a tomato slice and let stand for 10 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
Roast the pork chops in the oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until fully cooked. Let them rest for 10 minutes before serving. A food thermometer should read at least 145°F (63°C).
